yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v17.8 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>About Us | Eden London</title>
<meta name="description" content="Eden are a principal contractor with vast experience covering all aspects of the construction industry ranging from £10k to £2m projects. Read on to find out more about our approach." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://edenlondon.co.uk/about/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="About Us | Eden London" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Eden are a principal contractor with vast experience covering all aspects of the construction industry ranging from £10k to £2m projects. Read on to find out more about our approach." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://edenlondon.co.uk/about/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="edenlondon" />
<meta property="article:modified_time" content="2021-10-19T11:16:29+00:00" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<script type="application/ld+json" class="yoast-schema-graph">{
	    "@context": "https://schema.org",
	    "@graph": [
	        {
	            "@type": "Organization",
	            "@id": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/#organization",
	            "name": "Eden London",
	            "url": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/",
	            "sameAs": [],
	            "logo": {
	                "@type": "ImageObject",
	                "@id": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/#logo",
	                "inLanguage": "en-US",
	                "url": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/logo.png",
	                "contentUrl": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/logo.png",
	                "width": 162,
	                "height": 166,
	                "caption": "Eden London"
	            },
	            "image": {
	                "@id": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/#logo"
	            }
	        },
	        {
	            "@type": "WebSite",
	            "@id": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/#website",
	            "url": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/",
	            "name": "edenlondon",
	            "description": "",
	            "publisher": {
	                "@id": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/#organization"
	            },
	            "potentialAction": [
	                {
	                    "@type": "SearchAction",
	                    "target": {
	                        "@type": "EntryPoint",
	                        "urlTemplate": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/?s={search_term_string}"
	                    },
	                    "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
	                }
	            ],
	            "inLanguage": "en-US"
	        },
	        {
	            "@type": "BreadcrumbList",
	            "@id": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/about/#breadcrumb",
	            "itemListElement": [
	                {
	                    "@type": "ListItem",
	                    "position": 1,
	                    "name": "Home",
	                    "item": "https://edenlondon.co.uk/"
	                },
	                {
	                    "@type": "ListItem",
	                    "position": 2,
	                    "name": "About"
	                }
	            ]
	        }
	    ]
	}</script>

yoast_head_json.title: About Us | Eden London
yoast_head_json.description: Eden are a principal contractor with vast experience covering all aspects of the construction industry ranging from £10k to £2m projects. Read on to find out more about our approach.
